description.zh-cn: 香港女演员、电视主持和女歌手，因其欢乐的形象、响亮的笑声和标志性的造型而深入民心，被誉为香港人的“开心果”。
description.en: A Hong Kong actress, television host, and singer, deeply loved by the public for her cheerful image, loud laughter, and iconic style, known as the "Happy Fruit" of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港男演员及男歌手，沈殿霞的前夫。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor and singer, and the ex-husband of Lydia Shum.

description.zh-cn: 香港女歌手及演员，沈殿霞与郑少秋的女儿。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer and actress, the daughter of Lydia Shum and Adam Cheng.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞在上海就读的中学。
description.en: The middle school Lydia Shum attended in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 香港的免费无线电视台，沈殿霞长期在此工作。
description.en: A free-to-air television broadcaster in Hong Kong where Lydia Shum worked for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 香港的电视台，沈殿霞曾于1990年至1994年间加盟。
description.en: A television station in Hong Kong which Lydia Shum joined from 1990 to 1994.

description.zh-cn: 由沈殿霞、汪明荃、王爱明、张德兰组成的女子音乐组合。
description.en: A female music group consisting of Lydia Shum, Liza Wang, Wong Oi-ming, and Cheung Tak-lan.

description.zh-cn: 由沈殿霞和罗文组成的歌唱组合。
description.en: A singing duo formed by Lydia Shum and Roman Tam.

description.zh-cn: 由张冲、谢贤、陈自强、陈浩、秦祥林、邓光荣和沈殿霞组成的演艺团体。
description.en: An entertainment group formed by Chang Chung, Patrick Tse, Willie Chan, Chan Ho, Charlie Chin, Alan Tang, and Lydia Shum.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞作为童星出道的电影作品。
description.en: The debut film of Lydia Shum as a child star.

description.zh-cn: 香港的电影制片公司，发掘沈殿霞成为童星。
description.en: A Hong Kong film production company that discovered Lydia Shum as a child star.

description.zh-cn: 电视制作人，介绍沈殿霞加入无线电视。
description.en: A television producer who introduced Lydia Shum to TVB.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员、制片人及导演，“银色鼠队”成员，沈殿霞的契兄。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor, producer, and director, a member of 'The Silver Rats', and Lydia Shum's sworn brother.

description.zh-cn: 香港男歌手，与沈殿霞组成“情侣合唱团”。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer who formed the 'Couple's Choir' with Lydia Shum.

description.zh-cn: 香港女艺人，沈殿霞的好友，郑少秋的前女友。
description.en: A Hong Kong female artist, friend of Lydia Shum, and ex-girlfriend of Adam Cheng.

description.zh-cn: 台湾女演员，郑少秋的现任妻子。
description.en: A Taiwanese actress, the current wife of Adam Cheng.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞的父亲。
description.en: Father of Lydia Shum.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Lydia Shum.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大城市，沈殿霞安葬于此，该市设立“肥肥日”以纪念她。
description.en: A city in Canada where Lydia Shum is buried. The city established "Fei Fei Day" in her memory.

description.zh-cn: 香港男歌手及演员，沈殿霞的契仔。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer and actor, the godson of Lydia Shum.

description.zh-cn: 郑欣宜是沈殿霞的独生女。
description.en: Joyce Cheng is the only daughter of Lydia Shum.

description.zh-cn: 郑欣宜是郑少秋的女儿。
description.en: Joyce Cheng is the daughter of Adam Cheng.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞与郑少秋曾有过三年的婚姻。
description.en: Lydia Shum and Adam Cheng were married for three years.

description.zh-cn: 在结婚前，沈殿霞与郑少秋同居11年。
description.en: Before getting married, Lydia Shum and Adam Cheng lived together for 11 years.

description.zh-cn: 郑少秋在与沈殿霞离婚后，于1989年与官晶华结婚。
description.en: After divorcing Lydia Shum, Adam Cheng married Kuan Ching-hua in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 郑少秋在与沈殿霞的婚姻期间与官晶华有绯闻并来往。
description.en: Adam Cheng was rumored to be involved with Kuan Ching-hua during his marriage to Lydia Shum.

description.zh-cn: 森森是郑少秋在与沈殿霞交往前的女友。
description.en: Sam-sam was Adam Cheng's girlfriend before he started dating Lydia Shum.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞曾在上海市第三女子中学就读。
description.en: Lydia Shum studied at Shanghai No. 3 Girls' High School.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞在无线电视工作多年，是其长寿综艺节目《欢乐今宵》的核心主持。
description.en: Lydia Shum worked at TVB for many years and was a core host of its long-running variety show 'Enjoy Yourself Tonight'.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞曾于1990年至1994年间短暂加盟亚洲电视。
description.en: Lydia Shum briefly joined Asia Television from 1990 to 1994.

description.zh-cn: 1960年，沈殿霞被邵氏电影公司招聘为童星，开始其演艺生涯。
description.en: In 1960, Lydia Shum was recruited by Shaw Brothers Studio as a child star, beginning her acting career.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞作为童星参演电影《一树桃花千朵红》，开启了她的演艺生涯。
description.en: Starring in the film 'The Peach Blossom Fan' as a child star launched Lydia Shum's acting career.

description.zh-cn: 1967年，沈殿霞得到蔡和平介绍而加入无线电视。
description.en: In 1967, Lydia Shum joined TVB through an introduction by Robert Chua.

description.zh-cn: 在沈殿霞的追思会上，邓光荣公开指责郑少秋未尽到丈夫和父亲的责任。
description.en: At Lydia Shum's memorial service, Alan Tang publicly accused Adam Cheng of failing in his duties as a husband and father.

description.zh-cn: 邓光荣是沈殿霞的契兄，二人感情甚笃。
description.en: Alan Tang was Lydia Shum's sworn brother, and they shared a very close relationship.

description.zh-cn: 为了褒扬沈殿霞的贡献，温哥华市议会宣布2008年6月1日为“肥肥日”（Ms. Fei Fei Day）。
description.en: To honor Lydia Shum's contributions, the Vancouver City Council declared June 1, 2008, as "Ms. Fei Fei Day".

description.zh-cn: 张学友是沈殿霞的契仔（干儿子）。
description.en: Jacky Cheung is the godson of Lydia Shum.

description.zh-cn: 沈贤祺是沈殿霞的父亲。
description.en: Shen Xianqi was Lydia Shum's father.

description.zh-cn: 沈邱淡素是沈殿霞的母亲。
description.en: Shen Qiu Dansu was Lydia Shum's mother.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞与罗文在1971年组成“情侣合唱团”。
description.en: Lydia Shum and Roman Tam formed the 'Couple's Choir' in 1971.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞于1973年加入“银色鼠队”，是团体中的“七妹”。
description.en: Lydia Shum joined 'The Silver Rats' in 1973 as the 'Seventh Sister' of the group.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞与汪明荃、王爱明及张德兰组成“四朵金花”。
description.en: Lydia Shum formed 'Four Golden Flowers' with Liza Wang, Wong Oi-ming, and Cheung Tak-lan.
